Method Detail

getRenderPeer

public RenderPeer getRenderPeer()
Specified by:
getRenderPeer in interface CanvasPeer

renderStart

public void renderStart(View view)
called when begining a new frame to draw. this should set up the projection matrix and the model matrix and get everything ready

render

public void render(RenderAtom atom)
renders the specific atom. The implementation will map the classname of the atom to the registered atomic renderer and call its render function. It is assumed that the transformation matrix has been set with a shader by this point, so all that should be necessary is drawing geometry. If this implementation modifies opengl state IT MUST PUT IT BACK before it exits since this is happening outside the state management.

Parameters:
atom -

setState

public void setState(RenderAtom atom,
                     Shader shader,
                     long stateId)
renders the specific atom. The implementation will map the classname of the atom to the registered atomic renderer and call its render function. This will only change the current shader if it is different from the one that is being requested. This check is extremely fast since at this point we only have to compare the shader state id's

Parameters:
atom -

renderDone

public void renderDone()
The frame is complete. The implementation should return as fast as possible, so possibly another thread should be used to wait for the drawing to be complete.
